bridge-type.label: OpenSprinkler HTTP Bridge
bridge-type.description: A connection to a stand alone OpenSprinkler device which communicates over HTTP.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: The host name or IP address of the OpenSprinkler Web API interface. It may or may not start with the protocol, e.g. in order to use https:// instead of the default http://.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of the OpenSprinkler Web API interface.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The admin password used to access the Web API interface.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.

parameter.name: basicUsername
parameter.label: Basic Auth Username
parameter.description: Used if the OpenSprinkler device is behind a basic auth protected reverse proxy.

parameter.name: basicPassword
parameter.label: Basic Auth Password
parameter.description: Used if the OpenSprinkler device is behind a basic auth protected reverse proxy.

thing-type.label: OpenSprinkler Station
thing-type.description: Controls a station connected to the OpenSprinkler device.

parameter.name: stationIndex
parameter.label: Station Index
parameter.description: The index of the station, starting with 0, of the station.

thing-type.label: OpenSprinkler Device
thing-type.description: A thing that receives data from the OpenSprinkler device directly.

channel-type.label: Rain Sensor
channel-type.description: Provides feedback on whether the OpenSprinkler device has detected rain or not.

channel-type.label: Sensor 2
channel-type.description: Sensor 2 can be setup as a rain, flow or soil moisture sensor.

channel-type.label: Water Level
channel-type.description: The current watering level in percent

channel-type.label: Flow Sensor Count
channel-type.description: A count of how many pulses the water flow sensor has given.

channel-type.label: Station State
channel-type.description: Controls a station on the OpenSprinkler device.

channel-type.label: Station Ignores Rain
channel-type.description: The station will ignore forecasted rain.

channel-type.label: Reset Stations
channel-type.description: Resets all stations back to CLOSED.

channel-type.label: Enable Programs
channel-type.description: Allow programs to auto run, when OFF, manually started stations still work.

channel-type.label: Queued
channel-type.description: Indicates if the station is queued to be turned on. Can be removed from the queue by turning off. ON is read-only.

channel-type.label: Remaining Water Time
channel-type.description: Read-only property of the remaining water time of the station.

channel-type.label: Next Duration
channel-type.description: The duration the station will be opened the next time it is switched on.

channel-type.label: Rain Delay
channel-type.description: The amount of time in hours to delay the running of any program.

channel-type.label: Run Program
channel-type.description: Run a program that is saved inside the OpenSprinkler Device.

channel-type.label: Open Station
channel-type.description: Opens the solenoid of a single station.
